theClanless:Acrobatics.NAME: Acrobatics
theClanless:Acrobatics.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Buffer. NL Your next attack costs 1 less Energy.

theClanless:BumsRush.NAME: Bum's Rush
theClanless:BumsRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! theclanless:Maneuver. NL Gain !theClanless:M2! theclanless:Press.

theClanless:CatBurglary.NAME: Cat Burglary
theClanless:CatBurglary.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !D! X !M! gold. Exhaust.

theClanless:FastHands.NAME: Fast Hands
theClanless:FastHands.DESCRIPTION: Retrieve a card from your discard pile and reduce it's cost by !M! . NL The retrieved card Exhausts.
theClanless:FastHands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retrieve a card from your discard pile and reduce it's cost by !M! . NL The retrieved card Exhausts.

theClanless:Flash.NAME: Flash
theClanless:Flash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theclanless:maneuvers and draw a card.
theClanless:Flash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theclanless:maneuvers and draw a card.

theClanless:GrowingFury.NAME: Growing Fury
theClanless:GrowingFury.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Consume a theclanless:press to increase the damage of this card by !M!
theClanless:GrowingFury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Consume a theclanless:press to increase the damage of this card by !M!

theClanless:IncreasedStrength.NAME: Increased Strength
theClanless:IncreasedStrength.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of all Potence attacks by !M! for the remainder of combat.
theClanless:IncreasedStrength.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of all Potence attacks by !M! for the remainder of combat.

theClanless:InfernalPursuit.NAME: Infernal Pursuit
theClanless:InfernalPursuit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, draw a card.
theClanless:InfernalPursuit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, draw !M! cards.

theClanless:ImmortalGrapple.NAME: Immortal Grapple
theClanless:ImmortalGrapple.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Consume theclanless:presses to apply Constricted equal to !M! + consumed presses. Otherwise, gain !M! presses.
theClanless:ImmortalGrapple.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Consume theclanless:presses to apply Constricted equal to !M! + consumed presses. Otherwise, gain !M! presses.

theClanless:NimbleFeet.NAME: Nimble Feet
theClanless:NimbleFeet.DESCRIPTION: Your next Skill is played twice.
theClanless:NimbleFeet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next skill and next attack are played twice.

theClanless:OrgyOfBlood.NAME: Orgy of Blood
theClanless:OrgyOfBlood.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card from your hand and heal !M! for each energy in its cost.

theClanless:Psyche.NAME: Psyche!
theClanless:Psyche.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theclanless:maneuvers. NL Take another turn after this one, keeping all theclanless:maneuvers. NL Exhaust.

theClanless:PulledFangs.NAME: Pulled Fangs
theClanless:PulledFangs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! weakness. If your last card played was an attack gain 1 energy.
theClanless:PulledFangs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! weakness. If your last card played was an attack gain 1 energy.

theClanless:RapidHealing.NAME: Rapid Healing
theClanless:RapidHealing.DESCRIPTION: Lose all regeneration. Gain !M! regeneration X times. NL Exhaust.
theClanless:RapidHealing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose all regeneration. Gain !M! regeneration X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

theClanless:SkinOfSteel.NAME: Skin of Steel
theClanless:SkinOfSteel.DESCRIPTION: Gain block equal to target monster's damage.
theClanless:SkinOfSteel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain black equal to all monster's damage.

theClanless:ThrownGate.NAME: Thrown Gate
theClanless:ThrownGate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Consume a theclanless:maneuver to increase damage and remove thorns by !M!.
theClanless:ThrownGate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Consume a theclanless:maneuver to increase damage and remove thorns by !M!.

theClanless:ThrownSewerLid.NAME: Thrown Sewer Lid
theClanless:ThrownSewerLid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Consume a theclanless:maneuver to increase damage and remove thorns by !M!.
theClanless:ThrownSewerLid.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Consume a theclanless:maneuver to increase damage and remove thorns by !M!.

theClanless:TornSignpost.NAME: Torn Signpost
theClanless:TornSignpost.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! strength. Lose !M! strength at the end of your turn. NL Innate.
theClanless:TornSignpost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! strength this turn. Keep 2 strength, lose the rest at the end of your turn. NL Innate. Exhaust.

theClanless:ItsaTrap.NAME: Trap!
theClanless:ItsaTrap.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a theclanless:press, gain another press.
theClanless:ItsaTrap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain a theclanless:press, gain another press.

theClanless:UndeadPersistence.NAME: Undead Persistence
theClanless:UndeadPersistence.DESCRIPTION: When you would die, prevent death and gain 1 HP and !M! intangible.
theClanless:UndeadPersistence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you would die, prevent death and gain 1 HP and !M! intangible.

theClanless:UnflinchingPersistence.NAME: Unflinching Persistence
theClanless:UnflinchingPersistence.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Increase the block of all Unflinching Persistence by !M!.
theClanless:UnflinchingPersistence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Increase the block of all Unflinching Persistence by !M!.

theClanless:VampiricSpeed.NAME: Vampiric Speed
theClanless:VampiricSpeed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Consume 1 theclanless:maneuver to gain !M! block.
theClanless:VampiricSpeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Consume up to 2 theclanless:maneuvers to gain !M! block each.

theClanless:WakeWithEveningsFreshness.NAME: Wake w/ Evening Freshness
theClanless:WakeWithEveningsFreshness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. If target monster intends to attack gain !M! dexterity.
theClanless:WakeWithEveningsFreshness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. If target monster intends to attack gain !M! dexterity.

theClanless:WeightedWalkingStick.NAME: Weighted Walking Stick
theClanless:WeightedWalkingStick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each theclanless:Press. NL If it attacked more than !M! times it is Exhausted.

theClanless:WellAimedCar.NAME: Well Aimed Car
theClanless:WellAimedCar.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage at the end of next turn.
theClanless:WellAimedCar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage at the end of next turn.
